entry.title: Help and Problem feedback
entry.content:
Help:

  1. Click data to edit;

  2. A quick double click on this row will take you to the next selected level;

  3. Select a row and click the ‘Save’ button to save it;

  4. Select a row and click the ‘Delet’ button to delete it;

  5. Select a line and then click the ‘Skill’ button to enter the Skill details window of this player.

  6. Select a line and then click the ‘Train’ button to enter the Train details window of this player;

  7. Delete any data before deleting its next level.

  8. If you have further questions, you can send them to 19382027747@163.com

  9. And if you want to edit Skill, you should know:

The Category has three categories corresponding to 3-4 Skills. In Level,
you can grade the skills in sequence and Categorys them with a semicolon. In Comment,
the categorys are separated by a semicolon:

1.Passing
1.1. Standard
1.2. Spin
1.3. The Pop
2.Tackling
2.1. The Front
2.2. Rear
2.3. Side
2.4. Scrabble
3.Kicking
3.1. The Drop
3.2. Punt
3.3. Grubber
3.4. Goal

  1. If you would like to give me any feedback, feel free to leave a comment in the comment box at the bottom with your contact information, thanks! :)
